name: trace.moe-telegram-bot
description: This Telegram Bot can tell the anime when you send an screenshot to it

TELEGRAM_TOKEN.description: Create a Telegram Bot to get a token, see: https://core.telegram.org/bots

TELEGRAM_WEBHOOK.description: Replace xxxxxx with your app name.

TRACE_MOE_KEY.description: Leave this blank unless you have a trace.moe API Key, see: https://soruly.github.io/trace.moe-api/
